import HttpService from"./http.service";class CrudService{constructor(){// users requests
this.imageUpload=async(formData,id)=>{const imageUpdate=`uploads/users/${id}/profile-image`;return await HttpService.post(imageUpdate,formData);};this.getUsers=async()=>{const usersEndpoint="users?include=roles";return await HttpService.get(usersEndpoint);};this.deleteUser=async id=>{const endpoint=`users/${id}`;return await HttpService.delete(endpoint);};this.createUser=async payload=>{const endpoint="users";return await HttpService.post(endpoint,payload);};this.getUser=async id=>{const endpoint=`users/${id}?include=roles`;return await HttpService.get(endpoint);};this.getUserWithPermissions=async id=>{const endpoint=`users/${id}?include=roles,roles.permissions`;return await HttpService.get(endpoint);};this.updateUser=async(payload,id)=>{const endpoint=`users/${id}`;return await HttpService.patch(endpoint,payload);};// roles requests
this.getRoles=async()=>{const rolesEndpoint="roles";return await HttpService.get(rolesEndpoint);};this.deleteRole=async id=>{const endpoint=`roles/${id}`;return await HttpService.delete(endpoint);};this.createRole=async payload=>{const endpoint="roles";return await HttpService.post(endpoint,payload);};this.updateRole=async(payload,id)=>{const endpoint=`roles/${id}`;return await HttpService.patch(endpoint,payload);};this.getRole=async id=>{const endpoint=`roles/${id}`;return await HttpService.get(endpoint);};// categories requests
this.getCategories=async()=>{const categoriesEndpoint="categories";return await HttpService.get(categoriesEndpoint);};this.deleteCategory=async id=>{const endpoint=`categories/${id}`;return await HttpService.delete(endpoint);};this.createCategory=async payload=>{const endpoint="categories";return await HttpService.post(endpoint,payload);};this.getCategory=async id=>{const categoriesEndpoint=`categories/${id}`;return await HttpService.get(categoriesEndpoint);};this.updateCategory=async(payload,id)=>{const categoriesEndpoint=`categories/${id}`;return await HttpService.patch(categoriesEndpoint,payload);};// tag requests
this.getTags=async()=>{const tagsEndpoint="tags";return await HttpService.get(tagsEndpoint);};this.deleteTag=async id=>{const endpoint=`tags/${id}`;return await HttpService.delete(endpoint);};this.createTag=async payload=>{const endpoint="tags";return await HttpService.post(endpoint,payload);};this.getTag=async id=>{const endpoint=`tags/${id}`;return await HttpService.get(endpoint);};this.updateTag=async(payload,id)=>{const endpoint=`tags/${id}`;return await HttpService.patch(endpoint,payload);};// item requests
this.getItems=async()=>{const tagsEndpoint="items";return await HttpService.get(tagsEndpoint);};this.deleteItem=async id=>{const endpoint=`items/${id}`;return await HttpService.delete(endpoint);};this.getCategoryOfItem=async id=>{const endpoint=`items/${id}/category`;return await HttpService.get(endpoint);};this.getTagsOfItem=async id=>{const endpoint=`items/${id}/tags`;return await HttpService.get(endpoint);};this.createItem=async payload=>{const endpoint="items";return await HttpService.post(endpoint,payload);};this.itemImageUpload=async(formData,id)=>{const imageUpdate=`uploads/items/${id}/image`;return await HttpService.post(imageUpdate,formData);};this.getItem=async id=>{const endpoint=`items/${id}?include=category,tags`;return await HttpService.get(endpoint);};this.updateItem=async(payload,id)=>{const endpoint=`items/${id}`;return await HttpService.patch(endpoint,payload);};}}export default new CrudService();
